data.title: Policy Memo Database
data.meta_description: While many interesting memos may still be classified, a variety of open source memos and archives exist and provide invaluable lessons in policy writing. The database below is a useful shortcut to exploring policy memos -- in the U.S. and abroad, at the federal and local levels -- in order to compare and contrast styles, tone, and structure.
data.text: While many interesting memos may still be classified, a variety of open source memos and archives exist and provide invaluable lessons in policy writing.
